text: Cafe Express operates 19 fast-casual, bistro-style restaurants in the U.S. state of Texas in the major Houston and Dallas areas. The company's headquarters are in Houston."Cafe Express LLC." BusinessWeek. Retrieved on October 17, 2009. The chain was founded in 1984 by Schiller Del Grande Restaurant Group. In 2004 fast food giant Wendy's International acquired a 70% stake in Cafe Express. In 2007, Wendy's sold the company back to Schiller Del Grande and its original investor, Redstone. ==References== ==External links== * Cafe Express Category:Regional restaurant chains in the United States Category:Restaurants in Texas Category:Wendy's International Category:Companies based in Houston Category:Restaurants established in 1984
title: Cafe Express
